quest.name: Checking for Cavities
journal:
Though you cannot be certain, you have the unsettling feeling that Stigma-4's giant, ever-staring eye is focused on your mouth.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to the advanced dental polishing unit.
objectives: Mine [Error] from the Elysian seas.Deliver [Error] to the advanced dental polishing unit.Gather [Error] from the Elysian seas.Catch [Error] from the Elysian seas.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: In the leporid proprietor's dubious wisdom, it has been decided that teeth polishing tools are to be supplied for maintenance of the oral cavities of draconic clientele, and incorporated into a new service offered to café patrons.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Determining suitable matter to fulfill this purpose requires an extensive search covering billions of entries across thousands of databases...a trifling task. Material located.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Allied unit Forename is hereby requested to relocate to the Elysian seas, where it may procure porous stones from rocky outcrops in the vicinity.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Allied unit Forename is hereby requested to relocate to the Elysian seas, where it may procure suitably fibrous kelp from vegetation patches in the vicinity.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Allied unit Forename is hereby requested to relocate to the Elysian seas, where it may procure helpless spongy life-forms. Use of gold salmon roe as a lure is projected to be effective.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Samples may be delivered to the advanced dental polishing unit stationed in Reah Tahra, which will fabricate them into tools and perform experimental teeth maintenance. Your swift completion of objectives is appreciated.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04634
dialogue.text: <whirr> Once requested samples have been converted into tools, this unit will approach the nearest dragon, demand the unclenching of said dragon's jaw, and proceed to climb inside of its mouth to perform extensive teeth polishing. Estimated chances of survival: less than one percent.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04634
dialogue.text: <whirr> Once requested samples have been converted into tools, this unit will approach a nearby dragon, demand the unclenching of said dragon's jaw, and proceed to climb inside of its mouth to perform extensive teeth polishing. Estimated chances of survival: less than one percent.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04634
dialogue.text: Initializing material conversion process... This unit will now transition to dental polishing protocols to carry out its mission. Good-bye, allied life-form...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of allied unit Forename acknowledged. Your contribution to the universe's aggregate dental hygiene levels is greatly appreciated. Initializing gratitude monologue...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: ...Review of records of conflict on the Dragonstar indicate dragons maintained oral hygiene by masticating on rocks and similar objects. Necessity of a dental polishing service now brought into question.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, there is a non-zero possibility of positive reception by café patrons. Production of specialized teeth cleaning drones added to queue, with trial runs to ensue. Allied unit's continued cooperation remains categorized as “necessary.”

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）
